caption: Citi's profitability is expected to remain below its rivals
trend_summary: Based on analyst estimates for full-year 2026, Citigroup's Return on Tangible Equity is forecast to be approximately 9.4%, which is substantially lower than its peers. JPMorgan Chase is expected to lead at 17%, followed by Bank of America at 15% and Wells Fargo at 14%.
author: Stephen Gandel
article_title: Wall Street doubts Citi chief Jane Fraser can hit crucial target

caption: Citi lags behind other big US banks
trend_summary: From 2021 to 2024, Citigroup's rebased share price has consistently underperformed its major US banking peers. While all bank stocks show volatility, the share prices of JPMorgan Chase, Bank of America, and Wells Fargo have generally outperformed Citigroup, which has shown the least growth in the period.
author: Stephen Gandel
